article_title: 10 healthcare stories you should expect to read in 2016
article_text:
The impact of rising health costs and rampant consolidation are expected to dominate healthcare headlines in 2016, according to consultant Paul Keckley of Navigant Healthcare.

The healthcare analyst has created a list of his top 10 story lines, predicting more scrutiny of things like insurance consolidation, rising drug costs and the evolution of the healthcare executive suite.

Advance to the next slide to see his picks.
